summary: A documentary following the exploits of a group of filmmakers as they take their independent feature, Muerte al amanecer (2006), along the film festival circuit, and the politics, pitfalls, triumphs and comic tragedies they encounter along the way. Full of interviews with important players in the indie world, this is a must see for young filmmakers on what happens when the shooting stops.
cast: Scott Storm|Paul Osborne|Brian Osborne|Paul J. Alessi|Brandon Barrera|Charlotte Bell|Leslie Blackburn-Harlow|Anna Boling|Brandon Borbeck|Adam Carl|Jason Carney|Marshall Cook|Harkeerat Dhillon|Andy Dick|Troy Duffy|Joe Eckardt|Patrick Ewald|David Faustino|Jenna Fischer|Don Franken|Cecily Gambrell|John Daniel Gavin|Chris Gore|Gregory Hall|Mark Hefti|Karl T. Hirsch|Lloyd Kaufman|Chris LaMont|Monty Lapica|Dean Lennert|Traci Lords|Jerri Manthey|Jason Marsh|Bob Nuchow|Damon O'Steen|Daniel F. title: Official Rejection
